entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NE 33 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
